userreviews.userReview: Very good book. Well organized, up to the point without exceeding common sense volume. Short and clear examples, easy to reproduce the same result. Good for developers and DBA.
The book has been reviewed by Oracle ACEs Kamran Agayev, Ronald Rood and Mohan Dutta.

description: The book "Oracle Advanced PL/SQL Developer Professional Guide" is a quick and precise preparation book for 1Z0-146 certification examination. It will serve as a handbook for the Oracle professionals at Associate level who are seeking to raise up at Professional Level. The book covers the Advanced PL/SQL topics as prescribed by the Oracle university for 1Z0-146 Advanced PL/SQL examination.The book covers the chapter outlines in detail with clear explanation and demonstrations as required. The practice questions at the end of each chapter gives actual taste of the skill level required examination.
title: Oracle Advanced PL/SQL Developer Professional Guide
